```{r}
trainDF <- read.csv("train.csv", header = T, stringsAsFactors = F)
str(trainDF)

#summary stat for all numerical variables.  LotFrontage, MasVnArea, and GarageYrBlt found to have NA's
varNames <- names(trainDF)
for (i in 1:length(trainDF)){
  if (!is.character(trainDF[[i]])){
    print(varNames[i])
    print(summary(trainDF[[i]]))
  }
}

#isolate character variables

for (i in 1:length(trainDF)){
  if (is.character(trainDF[[i]])){
    print(varNames[i])
  }
}

#Set zones to numeric
trainDF$MSZoning <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "A", 1,  
                           ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "C (all)", 2,  
                                  ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "FV", 3,  
                                         ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "I", 4,  
                                                ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "RH", 5,  
                                                       ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "RL", 6,  
                                                              ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "RP", 7, 
                                                                     ifelse(trainDF$MSZoning == "RM", 8, trainDF$MSZoning)))))))))

#set street to numeric
trainDF$Street <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$Street == "Pave", 1,
                                    ifelse(trainDF$Street == "Grvl", 2, trainDF$Street)))

#set alley to numeric
trainDF$Alley <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$Alley == "Pave", 1, 
                                   ifelse(trainDF$Alley == "Grvl", 2,
                                          ifelse(trainDF$Alley == "NA", 0, trainDF$Alley))))

#set lot shape to numeric                                 
trainDF$LotShape <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$LotShape == "Reg", 1,  
                           ifelse(trainDF$LotShape == "IR1", 2,  
                                  ifelse(trainDF$LotShape == "IR2", 3, 4))))
                                  
#set land contour to numeric                                 
trainDF$LandContour <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$LandContour == "Lvl", 1,  
                           ifelse(trainDF$LandContour == "Bnk", 2,  
                                  ifelse(trainDF$LandContour == "Low", 3, 
                                         ifelse(trainDF$LandContour == "HLS", 4, trainDF$LandContour)))))

#set Utilities to numeric                                  
trainDF$Utilities <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$Utilities == "ELO", 1,  
                           ifelse(trainDF$Utilities == "NoSewr", 2,  
                                  ifelse(trainDF$Utilities == "NoSeWa", 3, 
                                         ifelse(trainDF$Utilities == "AllPub", 4, trainDF$Utilities)))))                            

#set lot configuration to numeric                                 
trainDF$LotConfig <- as.numeric(ifelse(trainDF$LotConfig == "Inside", 1,  
                           ifelse(trainDF$LotConfig == "Corner", 2,  
                                  ifelse(trainDF$LotConfig == "CulDSac", 3, 
                                         ifelse(trainDF$LotConfig == "FR2", 4, 
                                                ifelse(trainDF$LotConfig == "FR3", 5, trainDF$LotConfig))))))

#assume NA means there is no driveway infront of property
for (i in 1:length(trainDF$LotFrontage)){
  if (is.na(trainDF$LotFrontage[i])){
    trainDF$LotFrontage[i] <- 0 
  }
}

#assume NA means there is no masonry veneer
for (i in 1:length(trainDF$MasVnrArea)){
  if (is.na(trainDF$MasVnrArea[i])){
    trainDF$MasVnrArea[i] <- 0 
  }
}

#assume NA means there is no garage, set value to blank "." for SAS
for (i in 1:length(trainDF$GarageYrBlt)){
  if (is.na(trainDF$GarageYrBlt[i])){
    trainDF$GarageYrBlt[i] <- "." 
  }
}
```
